detectors.description:
Token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#18-53) has the function that can only return the default value
	Default value functions:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#21)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#25)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#31)
	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#38)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#44)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#49)

detectors.description:
RegularToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#57-65) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#59)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#60)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#61)

detectors.description:
RegularToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#67-75) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[_from] >= _value && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#68)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#69)
	- balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#70)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#71)

detectors.description: Parameter RegularToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#77) is not in mixedCase

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#21)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#25)
	- RegularToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#77-79)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#31)
	- RegularToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#57-65)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- RegularToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#81-85)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#44)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#49)
	- RegularToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AcidsToken.sol#87-89)
